meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing kaolinite.
meanings.sent1: The kaolinitic soil was perfect for growing crops.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a kaolinitic clay to sculpt a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent3: The kaolinitic paint made the walls look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as smooth as kaolinitic porcelain.
meanings.sent5: The kaolinitic texture of the fabric felt soft against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The kaolinitic rock had a unique white color.
meanings.sent2: The potter crafted a kaolinitic bowl that was both sturdy and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The chef's kaolinitic cake looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky resembled kaolinitic formations.
meanings.sent5: The kaolinitic appearance of the building gave it a modern feel.
